chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 mini has the above problem:

There were issues transferring data from my current iPhone to the received device. The phone got stuck a few times during data transfer.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
YR
